body:
Hi all,


Feedback from some off-list communication: after some help from Greg:
	You need to run it again using the -f of obj2rad during your conversion.  The issue is that obj2rad inserts textures between the material modifier 	and the surfaces, which confuses rfluxmtx (and rcontrib).  If you add the -f option, it should eliminate the issue.
the script works, rfluxmtx behaviour is back to normal!


Cheers, 


Reinier Zeldenrust
Environmental Designer
Atelier Ten
Environmental Design Consultants + Building Services Engineers


CIBSE Building Services Consultancy of the Year 2011
UK-GBC Sustainability Consultant of the Year 2009






-----Original Message-----
___
